text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, each contractor and subcontractor under a public work contract shall pay not less than the prevailing wage rate of straight time to an employee for each hour that the employee works.

A contractor and subcontractor shall pay an employee the prevailing wage rate of overtime for each hour that the employee works:
in excess of 10 hours in any single calendar day;
in excess of 40 hours per each workweek; or
on Sunday or a legal holiday.
